Wouldn't it be nice if Junit could do all the hard work and create the
tests for you? 

We've started an open source project to explore that idea. Obviously
it can't work out every condition. However as a start, it can generate
junit boundary test conditions and is data driven by JTestcase.

If you are interested its also hosted on sourceforge 
http://sourceforge.net/projects/spike-test-gen/

thanks
calvin
